title: Club Issue
body: I'm having the same problem others are: It says I'm not in my own club on my client but shows I am on my friends and I can't be added to the club.

replies.body: Can you provide me with the Club name and tag that you're experiencing this with so I can try some things from our end? Thanks!

You should see the issue resolved now. I hit a button from our side that should have done the trick.

Let me know if you still can't see it. :P
